An incident regarding Indian Railways data breach has been reported in the media. In this connection, Railway Board had shared a possible data breach incident alert of CERT-In to IRCTC reporting a data breach pertaining to Indian Railways passengers: Indian Railways

This will help Railways bring down costs, boost efficiency and strengthen the growth of 5G in the country

Indian Railways to upgrade 1,000 small stations across India under a new “Amrit Bharat Station Scheme”. This is in addition to the ambitious plan to renovate 200 large stations currently underway.

#DidYouKnow In the place where railway quarters stand now in the colony called Berkley Place in Byculla, stood a handsome bungalow which served as the residence of James Berkley, the first Chief Engineer of GIPR who planned the first rail line in India. #IndianRailways #History
